thread.title: blake and brock gratton introduce jellytank, the ultimate desktop aquarium
thread.title_full: blake and brock gratton introduce jellytank, the ultimate desktop aquarium

author: Blake Gratton
title: blake and brock gratton introduce jellytank, the ultimate desktop aquarium
text:
blake and brock gratton introduce jellytank, the ultimate desktop aquarium 
the JellyTank by florida-based designers blake and brock gratton is a desktop jellyfish aquarium customized for homes, offices or commercial spaces. the goal is to create a tank focused on the natural flow that this marine species would typically experience in the oceans whilst offering a mesmerizing, slick and fully functional product. 
JellyTank is built with functionality and form 

so for all the jellyfish lovers out there, blake and brock gratton have made it surprisingly easier to own a bunch of them as pets in their state-of-the-art tank . based on extensive research, the JellyTan k is user-friendly and easy to maintain in different contexts. to keep the animal comfortable in this habitat, the design includes a laminar water flow pattern which mimics the natural currents and conditions of open water. during nighttime, colored LED lights set the mood by emphasizing the curvy outlines of the design as well as the translucent bodies of the invertebrates floating across the tank. 
a sleek design is accompanied with an LED lighting to set the mood
